overview: In search of himself, our character explores, in the enigmatic meanders of his body and mind, the multiple facets of his personality. Through the game of transfigurations, he discovers himself at once man, woman, child, animal. The magic of the mirror has worked, witnessing his demultiplication in time and space, but can he escape from this shadow that pursues him constantly? Is this mask finally a part of his conscience, or rather the testimony of innocence? In this dreamlike setting, tinged with surrealism, will our actor finally understand who he is?
title: Mise à nu
